html.subject: Recover Password
html.description: To recover your password, please click the button below.
html.expire-time: This link is only valid for 3 hours.
html.if-its-not-you: If you did not submit this request, please ignore this email.

form.title: Recover Password
form.description: To recover your password, please enter your email in the box below and a password recovery link will be sent to you.

link-expired: The password recovery link has expired.
new-password-title: Your temporary password has been generated.
new-password-description: Please save it and then click the button below to be redirected to the account settings page to set a custom password.
